1429230.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Mountains Map Pack
1429230.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Mountains Map Pack

The Mountains Map Pack features hand-drawn images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This art package allows for the creation of elevation relative areas such as mountains, cliffs, canyons, and even castle walls. This art package works seamlessly with all other SmiteWorks hand-drawn map packages.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Mountain base background image and 5 premade maps (Chasm, Mountainous Chasm, Cliffside Fort, Forest Ruins, and a Mountainside map)
  • brushes (stone and wooden floors, castle walls, chasms, cliffs and inclines, river, fences, and more)
  • Decorations including many mountain stream images and waterfalls, snow elements, cave entrances, open drawbridge, and more
  • effects for snowy textured overlays
  • tiles for creating additional elements with cliffs, inclines, and rivers and work in conjunction with the brushes of this map pack
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
